thread.title: Disney ‘Dine-on-the-Go’ Debuts January 12 in Magic Kingdom Park at Walt Disney World Resort
thread.title_full: Disney ‘Dine-on-the-Go’ Debuts January 12 in Magic Kingdom Park at Walt Disney World Resort

author: Pam Brandon
title: Disney ‘Dine-on-the-Go’ Debuts January 12 in Magic Kingdom Park at Walt Disney World Resort
text:
From January 12 until February 22nd, guests visiting Magic Kingdom Park at Walt Disney World Resort for the day can purchase a Disney Dine-on-the-Go one-day, quick-service offering that includes one lunch quick-service entrée and one non-alcoholic beverage that’s good until 4 p.m., and one dinner quick-service entrée and one non-alcoholic beverage that’s good after 4 p.m. (Dessert is not included).
Guests can purchase Disney Dine-on-the-Go at Magic Kingdom Park Vacation Planning booths. Certificates also are available for children ages 3 to 9. 

Participating restaurant locations include Casey’s Corner , Columbia Harbour House , Cosmic Ray’s Starlight Café , Pecos Bill Tall Tale Inn and Cafe and Pinocchio Village Haus .
Valid park admission is required to utilize the certificates. Price is $29.00, and $12.00 for ages 3 to 9.
